news_header: FSB arrests four individuals near Russia-Finland border, reportedly not Russian citizens.
news_original_title: Venäläismediat: Venäjän rajavartijat ottivat keskiviikkona kiinni neljä Suomeen pyrkinyttä
news_text: The Russian FSB has detained four individuals near the Russia-Finland border, specifically in the Vyborg region, on February 19. Reports from Interfax and 47news indicate that these individuals were attempting to reach Finland. Along with the four detainees, their assistants were also arrested. Notably, none of the detainees are reported to be Russian nationals. Video evidence released by the FSB shows the detainees on the ground surrounded by Russian border guards. Heikki Ahtiainen, Deputy Commander of the Southeast Finnish Border Guard, refrained from commenting on the incident but noted that the Vyborg border guard is responsible for border control.
